titles.title: To amend title 10, United States Code, to provide for the membership of the Commandant of the Coast Guard on the Joint Chiefs of Staff.
To amend title 10, United States Code, to provide for the membership of the Commandant of the Coast Guard on the Joint Chiefs of Staff.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: This bill revises the composition of the Joint Chiefs of Staff to include the Commandant of the Coast Guard.
